summary: An email from an FBI forensic accountant forwarding documents from a JPMC production regarding Jeffrey Epstein, including a certificate stating Epstein was the sole shareholder of Financial Trust Company Inc.

persons.name: Jeffery Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the sole shareholder of Financial Trust Company Inc. in a certificate from the company's secretary. The email references documents from a JPMC production regarding him.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Sent the email forwarding documents from a JPMC production regarding Jeffrey Epstein and offering to answer questions.

connections.description: A certificate states Jeffery Epstein is the sole shareholder of Financial Trust Company Inc.

events.title: Email forwarding Epstein financial documents
events.description: An FBI forensic accountant sends an email forwarding documents from a JPMC production regarding Jeffrey Epstein, including ownership information for Financial Trust Company Inc.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

keyFacts: A certificate from the Secretary of Financial Trust Company, Inc. states that Jeffery E. Epstein is the sole shareholder of the company.
The document is an email from an FBI forensic accountant forwarding records from a JPMC (JPMorgan Chase) production related to Epstein.
The referenced documents include corporate records, emails regarding ownership, and a due diligence document related to Jeffery Epstein.
